scripts.generate:sdk:ts: rimraf sdks/typescript && openapi-generator-cli generate -i docs/openapi/intelgraph.v1.yaml -g typescript-fetch -o sdks/typescript --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,npmName=@intelgraph/sdk,npmVersion=0.0.1,typescriptThreePlus=true,withInterfaces=true,modelPropertyNaming=original
scripts.generate:sdk:python: rimraf sdks/python && openapi-generator-cli generate -i docs/openapi/intelgraph.v1.yaml -g python -o sdks/python --additional-properties=packageName=intelgraph_sdk,projectName=intelgraph-sdk,packageVersion=0.0.1,hideGenerationTimestamp=true
scripts.generate:sdk:java: rimraf sdks/java && openapi-generator-cli generate -i docs/openapi/intelgraph.v1.yaml -g java -o sdks/java --additional-properties=library=resttemplate,groupId=ai.intelgraph,artifactId=intelgraph-sdk,artifactVersion=0.0.1,dateLibrary=java8
